mapper.insert: insert into creations_file (file_system_name, file_original_name, creation_number) values(#{fileSystemName}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{creationNumber})
mapper.delete: delete from creations_file f where f.creation_number in (select c.creation_number from creations c where member_number = #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select cf.file_system_name from creations c join creations_file cf on c.creation_number = cf.creation_number where member_number = #{memerNumber}
select file_system_name from creations_file cf where creation_number = #{creationNumber}
